ntokloapi-python documentation
==============================

ntokloapi-python is an API connector to use the `nToklo recommendation
engine <http://www.ntoklo.com/>`_ for your e-commerce site.

Support
-------

The ntokloapi-python connector supports the following versions of Python:

* Python 2.7.x
* Python 3.3.x
* Python 3.4.x
* Python 3.5.x

Features
--------

* Events
* Products
* Blacklists
* Recommendations

How do I use it?
----------------

To be able to use the nToklo recommendation engine, you need to create an application in the nToklo console so you can get an API key and API secret.

You can create your own application `here <http://console.ntoklo.com>`_
